web_snippets: Kelly McMasters is an essayist, professor, mother, and former bookshop owner. She is the author of the Zibby Book Club pick The Leaving Season.
Kelly McMasters is a former bookshop owner, and an author and essayist. She is the author of The Leaving Season: A Memoir-in-Essays (WW Norton, 2023)
